nodes.text: Eyan McDermitt was a male pirate leader who lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.
In Star Wars Galaxies, Eyan McDermitt's species, gender, and appearance would fluctuate after each server reset. However, the quest journal indicated that he was a male.

There was some speculation amongst players of Star Wars Galaxies that the name Eyan McDermitt may have been a reference to the Star Wars actors Ewan McGregor, Ian McDiarmid, or both. However, these claims are unverifiable.
